metadata.title: CVE-2020-36230 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was discovered in OpenLDAP before 2.4.57 leading in an assertionfailure in slapd in the X.509 DN parsing in decode.c ber_next_element,resulting in denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36230` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ldap-utils - 2.4.57+dfsg-2ubuntu1
libldap-common - 2.4.57+dfsg-2ubuntu1
libldap2 - 2.4.57+dfsg-2ubuntu1
slapd - 2.4.57+dfsg-2ubuntu1
slapd-contrib - 2.4.57+dfsg-2ubuntu1
slapd-smbk5pwd - 2.4.57+dfsg-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openldap package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.57+dfsg-2ubuntu1').
